sentences.sContent: the ability to define clients’ needs
The duties of the post are difficult to define.
sentences.sCn: 这一职位的职责很难界定。

sentences.sContent: ...one could no longer ignore the division that had come to define the American economic landscape...
...mass imprisonment has come to define America--a country...
...The whole process of how you define stability gets reordered...
...children begin to define subjects and erect boundaries that needn't other-wise exist...

remMethod.val: de(表加强) ＋ fin(范围) ＋ e → 划定范围 → 给…下定义， 限定

words.tran: 有定义的，确定的；清晰的，轮廓分明的
决定性的；最后的；限定的
最典型的；起决定性作用的
可下定义的；可确定的；可限定的
清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地
定义；[物] 清晰度；解说
确定性，定指；明确；清晰度；梅性
使明确；给...下定义；使...的轮廓分明（define的过去分词）
规定（define的ing形式）；给…下定义；表明特征

trans.tranOther: to describe something correctly and thoroughly, and to say what standards, limits, qualities etc it has that make it different from other things
